GetProperty.brief_description: Retrieve a 'property' value previously set with SetProperty.

GetWhitespaceSize.brief_description: Get the size of the dots used to mark space characters.

HomeWrap.brief_description: These are like their namesakes Home(Extend)?, LineEnd(Extend)?, VCHome(Extend)? except they behave differently when word-wrap is enabled: They go first to the start / end of the display line, like (Home|LineEnd)Display The difference is that, the cursor is already at the point, it goes on to the start or end of the document line, as appropriate for (Home|LineEnd|VCHome)(Extend)?.

IndicatorGetAlpha.brief_description: Get the alpha fill colour of the given indicator.

IndicatorGetForeground.brief_description: Retrieve the foreground colour of an indicator.

LineCopy.brief_description: Copy the line containing the caret.

SetUseHorizontalScrollBar.brief_description: Show or hide the horizontal scroll bar.

SetWhitespaceSize.brief_description: Set the size of the dots used to mark space characters.

SetWrapIndentMode.brief_description: Sets how wrapped sublines are placed.

SetWrapStartIndent.brief_description: Set the start indent for wrapped lines.

SetWrapVisualFlags.brief_description: Set the display mode of visual flags for wrapped lines.

StyleSetChangeable.brief_description: Set a style to be changeable or not (read only).

StyleSetEOLFilled.brief_description: Set a style to have its end of line filled or not.

StyleSetFaceName.brief_description: Set the font of a style.

StyleSetSize.brief_description: Set the size of characters of a style.

StyleSetSpec.brief_description: Extract style settings from a spec-string which is composed of one or more of the following comma separated elements: bold turns on bold italic turns on italics fore:[name or #RRGGBB] sets the foreground colour back:[name or #RRGGBB] sets the background colour face:[facename] sets the font face name to use size:[num] sets the font size in points eol turns on eol filling underline turns on underlining.

StyleSetVisible.brief_description: Set a style to be visible or not.

Tab.brief_description: If selection is empty or all on one line replace the selection with a tab character.

TargetFromSelection.brief_description: Make the target range start and end be the same as the selection range start and end.

ToString.brief_description: Get the string representation of this version object.

HasCopyright.brief_description: Returns true if a copyright string has been specified.

GetName.brief_description: Get the name of the object (library).

GetMicro.brief_description: Get the micro version, or release number.

HasDescription.brief_description: Return true if a description string has been specified.

wxScrollBar.brief_description: Constructor, creating and showing a scrollbar.

SetThumbPosition.brief_description: Sets the position of the scrollbar.

GetThumbPosition.brief_description: Returns the current position of the scrollbar thumb.

GetPageSize.brief_description: Returns the page size of the scrollbar.

Create.brief_description: Scrollbar creation function called by the scrollbar constructor.
Creation function, for two-step construction.

IsEllipsized.brief_description: Returns true if the window styles for this control contains one of the wxST_ELLIPSIZE_START, wxST_ELLIPSIZE_MIDDLE or wxST_ELLIPSIZE_END styles.

GetZoom.brief_description: Get the zoom factor of the page.

GetZoomType.brief_description: Get how the zoom factor is currently interpreted.

GetCompletions.brief_description: Pure virtual method returning all possible completions for the given prefix.
